root.name: Boulder Dash Rocks!
root.description: OverviewBoulder Dash Rocks! is a puzzle game developed by 10tacle Studios (DS version) and Magmic Inc (iPhone version) and published by both Magmic (iPhone) and 10tacle (DS) for the Nintendo DS and iPhone platforms.Boulder Dash Rocks! was released on the iPhone in the US, but the DS version was only released in Europe and Australia.
